title: Game Progress Route
content:
have answers. You killed one of those servants of Umberlee. Now they want you dead. Sorry, I just got turned around.

If you choose the first one, he will reply that it's the only port that matters in the whole city. Then, he will ask you if Gortash sent you. Your next set of choices will look like this:

[DECEPTION] Boss sent me to check up on the situation down here. [INTIMIDATION] I have questions. You have answers. You killed one of those servants of Umberlee. Now they want you dead. Sorry,
